Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'; import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar'; import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box'; import Icon from '@material-ui/core/Icon'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Page from "../Page"; import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; import CardActionArea from '@material-ui/core/CardActionArea'; import CardActions from '@material-ui/core/CardActions'; import CardContent from '@material-ui/core/CardContent'; import CardMedia from '@material-ui/core/CardMedia'; import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { }, paper: { padding: theme.spacing(2), textAlign: 'center', color: theme.palette.text.secondary, }, larger: { width: "100%", opacity: 0.5, }, paperthree: { textAlign: 'center', backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', backgroundPosition: 'center', width: "calc(100% + 12px)", left: 0, top: 64, position: "absolute", }, firstGrid: { marginTop: 'calc(100vw / (16/9))' }, explain: { color: 'white', marginLeft: '10px', fontFamily: 'Helvetica', }, screenSize: { }, upBox: { margin: 'auto', }, typoBody: { margin: theme.spacing(4, 0, 2), color: 'white', fontFamily: 'Montserrat', marginBottom: '45px', textAlign: 'center', }, typoContent: { color: 'white', fontWeight: 'bold', letterSpacing: '2px', fontStyle: 'italic', fontFamily: 'Vollkorn', textAlign: 'center', }, typoText: { color: 'white', letterSpacing: '2px', fontSize: 'bold', fontStyle: 'italic', fontFamily: 'Vollkorn', textAlign: 'center', }, typoTopSlide: { margin: theme.spacing(4, 0, 2), color: 'white', fontSize: 'bold', fontFamily: 'Montserrat', marginBottom: '25px', }, cardStyle: { }, boxTeam: { display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: "flext-start", }, bodyContent: { order: 3, [theme.breakpoints.up('sm')]: { order: 2, }, display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', justifyContent: 'center', textAlign: 'center', color: 'white', minWidth: '300px', }, bodyContent2: { order: 2, [theme.breakpoints.up('sm')]: { order: 3, }, display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', justifyContent: 'center', textAlign: 'center', color: 'white', minWidth: '300px', }, boxTeamChild: { display: 'flex', minWidth: '280px', maxWidth: '300px', borderRadius: "15px", }, contentBox: { minHeight: '113px' }, imgBox: { height: '270px', width: '270px', }, phoneImg: { width: '100%', }, boxUnderline:{ borderBottom: '4px solid white', width: '15%', margin: 'auto', marginTop: 20, }, })); const defaultProps = { bgcolor: 'background.paper', m: 1, style: { width: '5rem', height: '5rem' }, borderColor: 'text.primary', }; export default function About() { const classes = useStyles(); const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false); const [myopen, setmyOpen] = React.useState(false); const handleClick = () => { setOpen((prev) => !prev); }; const handlemyClick = () => { setmyOpen((prev) => !prev); }; const handleClickAway = () => { setOpen(false); }; return (
